oai_dc:dc.dc:title: News-QTLeap WSD/NED corpus
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The texts are sentences from the News parallel corpus. The texts contain monolingual sentences from parallel corpora for the following pairs: Basque-English, Bulgarian-English, Czech-English, Portuguese-English and Spanish-English. The English corpus is comprised by the English side of the Spanish-English corpus. The texts have been automatically annotated with NLP tools, including Word Sense Disambiguation, Named Entity Disambiguation and Coreference resolution.
